It is a cruel act to deny people access to one
another when we have the means available to us
to achieve it. Modern technology has put within
our reach the most effective tools ever devised
by man. For the poor, it is as though they have
been struck mute in the midst of their anguish,
to be denied access to that capability, created
for us all. This kind of deprivation is as evident
on the faces of the poor as are the most intense
feelings of pain.
